description.en:
Many years ago, there lived a knight who loved a saint. However, wanting to not hurt the saint who wasn't allowed to have personal feelings, he made sure to keep a safe distance from her. Eventually, the saint died in his arms and the devastated knight swore, with bitter anguish, 'If you get a chance at another life, I'll make sure that you will no longer live as a saint.' After long 300 years, the saint was reborn. Will their wishes finally come true in this life?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6621437), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=781339)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-hidden-saintess), [webtoons](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/the-hidden-saintess/list?title_no=4114)
* [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yincangdeshengnv/list?title_no=2004)
description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, hiduplah seorang ksatria yang mencintai seseorang saintess. Karena tidak ingin melukainya dengan perasaan pribadi miliknya, dia selalu menjaga jarak. Akan tetapi, sang saintess pada akhirnya mati di pelukannya dan ksatria yang hancur itu pun bersumpah, dengan penderitanya, 'jika anda memiliki kesempatan dikehidupan yang lain, saya bersumpah anda tidak akan hidup sebagai seorang saintess. ' setelah 300 tahun, sang saintess terlahir kembali. Apakah harapan mereka akhirnya tercapai dikehidupan ini?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6621437), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=781339)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-hidden-saintess)
* [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yincangdeshengnv/list?title_no=2004)
description.ko:
오래 전, 성녀를 사랑했던 성기사가 있었다. 사사로운 감정을 가지면 안 되는 성녀에게 해가 될까 그는 늘 한 발짝 떨어져서 성녀를 지켰다. 하지만 성녀는 결국 성기사의 품에서 최후를 맞이하고, 성기사는 비통하게 맹세했다. ‘제게 다음 생이 있다면, 그때는 당신을 성녀로 살게 하지 않겠습니다.’ 
기나긴 300년의 시간이 흘러, 성녀는 다시태어났다. 이번 생에는 두사람의 염원이 이루어질 수 있을까?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6621437), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=781339)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-hidden-saintess)
* [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yincangdeshengnv/list?title_no=2004)
description.zh:
前世今生只为守护你！
圣女和圣骑士的浪漫爱情！
很久以前，一位圣骑士爱着圣女，然而圣女是不能有私人感情的。圣骑士为了不伤害到她，总是跟她保持一步的距离，默默守护着她。但最终圣女死在了圣骑士的怀里，圣骑士万分悲痛，发誓道：“如若我有来生，一定不让你再做圣女。”三百年后，圣女得以重生，这一生他们的愿望能否实现呢?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6621437), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=781339)

**Official Translations:**
* [汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yincangdeshengnv/list?title_no=2004)
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-hidden-saintess)
